metadata.title: CVE-2025-1018 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The fullscreen notification is prematurely hidden when fullscreen isre-requested quickly by the user. This could have been leveraged to performa potential spoofing attack. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 135 andThunderbird < 135.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
